name: Tiramisu ~Pick Me Up~
description:
A game we made for the GMTK game jam 2017!

The theme was dual purpose mechanics, and while we were not able to implement our confidence meter mechanic in theme, I feel like we still followed the theme through theming and use of our assets. 

Tiramisu is a short visual novel about a sweet date at an italian restaurant.

My friend Morphosky did the art and sprites and I did everything else using Tyrano Visual Novel Builder. Definitely check her out on twitter.

Please enjoy!
